author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE GRADUALLY MOVING AWAY FROM THE BIG ISLAND BUT TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS CONTINUE...
summary:
...HONE GRADUALLY MOVING AWAY FROM THE BIG ISLAND BUT TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS CONTINUE...
 As of 11:00 AM HST Sun Aug 25
 the center of Hone was located near 18.8, -157.3
 with movement WNW at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 991 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
